thread.title: DSM to lay off 1,100 employees
thread.title_full: DSM to lay off 1,100 employees | MENAFN.COM

title: DSM to lay off 1,100 employees
text:
(MENAFN) Dutch nutritional supplements and Chemicals Company Royal DSM is planning to cut nearly 1,100 jobs on a worldwide scale, as part of a broad overhaul.

The benefit with the reorganization lies with streamlining business support functions and eliminating duplication of jobs, eventually this move will cut costs by USD173 million by the end of 2017.

"About half of the job cuts will be in the Netherlands, thus we will become more agile, focused and cost-efficient," said Chief Executive Officer with the changes.
